original_text: And I will set fire in Egypt: Sin shall have great pain, and No shall be rent asunder, and Noph shall have distresses daily.
korean_text: 내가 애굽에 불을 일으키리니 신 나라가 심히 근심할 것이며 노 나라는 찢겨 나누일 것이며 놉 나라가 날로 대적이 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And I will set fire in Egypt:
and No shall be rent asunder,
and Noph shall have distresses daily.
